comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: @JColbert1861: I spent a little time following up on the two other names mentioned in the catalog record. Do you know anything about Hester A. Dalton -- perhaps a sweetheart? I found the following about a Hester A. Dalton who seems to be the right age and have lived in the right area: From records.ancestry.com/Hester_Dalton_records.ashx?pid=43971912 Hester Dalton Born in Virginia, USA on 1844 to John Hugh Dalton and Phariba Webb. Hester married James B Manlove. Hester married Calvin M Dameron and had 2 children. She passed away on 21 Mar 1928 in Golden, Illinois, USA. From wolfdreamer4.tripod.com/id1.html Hester Dalton (Hattie), born March 22, 1842 in Carroll County Virginia; died March 31, 1928 in Quincy, Illinois; married Calvin M. Dameron(1) January 24, 1866 in Smyth Co. Virginia. From www.tombuchanan.net/gene/pages/c7-2.html Same Hester Dalton, with middle initial A From freepages.genealogy.rootsweb.ancestry.com/~shill957/pafg5... Hester A. "Hattie" DALTON was born on 22 Mar 1842 in Grayson Co., Virginia. She died on 31 Mar 1928 in Quincy, Illinois. She married Calvin M. DAMERON on 24 Jan 1866 in Smyth Co., Virginia. Hester A. "Hattie" DALTON was born on 22 Mar 1842 in Grayson Co., Virginia. She died on 31 Mar 1928 in Quincy, Illinois. She married James B. MANLOVE on 12 Oct 1872 in Adams Co., Illinois.
